Malice:
 
He smiled to her and when she kissed him again he feared he would just collapse to her touch.  He tilted his head to match the tilt of hers, wondering what she meant when she said he needed maintence.  He figured she meant whatever she felt in his neck.  He smiles as she took his hand, and they started off to the bot in question.  He closed his hand around hers and smiled.
 
"You might not believe this much, but this body was constructed in an organic fashion to conserve power.  You could say I have muscles.  I guess you felt them in my neck.  I'm not totally this way, the muscle sections in my chest and waist are meant to section for transformation, and I use nanobots for repairs and system maintence."
 
He reached over and took her other hand and put it on his right upper arm, to feel the somewhat soft and forgiving exterior and the synthetic muscles in his arm.

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
Wolfblade:

She chuckled softly, "Yeah, I suppose we had better get going."  Her
spark almost skipped a beat when he kissed her cheek.  Her hands were
resting on his shoulders as they stood there for a moment. Her optics
moved slightly to glance at his neck when she felt what she thought
was a slight twinge in his neck. Still mezmerized by him, her optics
refocused on his.  She felt absolute calm at that moment. All in the
universe was well. Just him and her and that's all that mattered. Even
in that perfect peace, she felt her spark start to break. She couldn't
show it to him, nor would she. She leaned up and kissed his lips
again. "Come on, we should get going. Oh, and when we get back, I
think you may need a tune up."  She tilted her head to the side. The
same side his neck had twinged at. "Or if you want, I can try to fix
it later on. Perhaps back at my quarters?" she said in a playful tone. 
She let her hands glide down his shoulders and down his arms until her
hands met his.  She let her right arm go and still held his right hand
with her left.  She stood there hoping they might walk the rest of the
way hand in hand. She did however wonder why a bot's neck hydrolics
would move like that. His body was acting more like an organic in that
respect and less like a bot. 


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

		
---------------------------------
